sections.heading: Cost of accountingAccounts filed by a tutor are at the expense of the minor, except that an account filed by a tutor who has been removed or an account not filed timely is at the expense of the tutor
sections.text: Cost of accountingAccounts filed by a tutor are at the expense of the minor, except that an account filed by a tutor who has been removed or an account not filed timely is at the expense of the tutor.
